test:
  commands:
    - pip check
    - export MPLBACKEND=agg
    - pytest --pyargs hyperspy --dist loadfile -k "not test_navigation_shape_signal1D
      and not test_navigation_shape_signal2D and not test_main_result and not test_nonconvolved
      and not test_jeol" -n 2
  imports:
    - hyperspy
    - hyperspy.Release
    - hyperspy._components
    - hyperspy._lazy_signals
    - hyperspy._signals
    - hyperspy.api
    - hyperspy.api_nogui
    - hyperspy.axes
    - hyperspy.component
    - hyperspy.components1d
    - hyperspy.components2d
    - hyperspy.datasets
    - hyperspy.decorators
    - hyperspy.defaults_parser
    - hyperspy.docstrings
    - hyperspy.drawing
    - hyperspy.drawing._markers
    - hyperspy.drawing._widgets
    - hyperspy.events
    - hyperspy.exceptions
    - hyperspy.external
    - hyperspy.external.astropy
    - hyperspy.external.mpfit
    - hyperspy.interactive
    - hyperspy.io
    - hyperspy.io_plugins
    - hyperspy.learn
    - hyperspy.logger
    - hyperspy.misc
    - hyperspy.misc.eds
    - hyperspy.misc.eels
    - hyperspy.misc.holography
    - hyperspy.misc.io
    - hyperspy.misc.machine_learning
    - hyperspy.model
    - hyperspy.models
    - hyperspy.roi
    - hyperspy.samfire
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.goodness_of_fit_tests
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.segmenters
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.weights
    - hyperspy.signal
    - hyperspy.signal_tools
    - hyperspy.signals
    - hyperspy.ui_registry
    - hyperspy.utils
  requires:
    - pip
    - pooch
    - pytest
    - pytest-xdist
about:

  summary: Multi-dimensional data analysis
